title: Potential Gamemode Idea
body:
Hey everyone,

So with Nexus Blitz still in testing I was thinking what other game modes Riot could implement League of Legends. After a bit of thinking and talking with a few of my friends, we came to an idea of a 6 v 6 game mode. How it would work would be very simple.

It works in a very similar way to Summoner's Rift. There are three lanes, each with two towers per lane, one inhibitor tower, one inhibitor then the nexus in the base. Champions would be divided into each of the 6 Champion Roles in League of Legends (Assassin, Fighter, Mage, Tank, Marksman and Support) and each lane is a 2 v 2.

For example:
One lane could have a tank and an assassin
One lane could have a marksman and a support, very similar to normal bot lane
And finally one lane could have a fighter and a mage

Also, to really set this gamemode apart from Summoner's Rift, it could be played on the old Magma Chamber map. Of course these wouldn't be set roles but I'd just like to hear everyone's thoughts on the idea so let me know what you think.
